sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useLanguage } from '../contexts/LanguageContext'; import { Music, Users, Heart, BookOpen, Church } from 'lucide-react'; const Ministries: React.FC = () => { const { t } = useLanguage(); return (

{t('ministries.title')}

{t('ministries.choir')}

Our vibrant choir sings in both English and IsiNdebele, bringing beautiful music to our liturgy.

Practice: Wednesdays 6:00 PM

{t('ministries.youth')}

Active youth ministry for ages 13-25, focusing on faith formation and community service.

Meetings: Saturdays 2:00 PM

{t('ministries.womens')}

Women's fellowship focusing on prayer, community support, and social outreach.

Meetings: First Sunday of each month

{t('ministries.mens')}

Men's fellowship for spiritual growth and community leadership.

Meetings: Second Saturday of each month

{t('ministries.prayer')}

Various prayer groups including Rosary, Bible study, and contemplative prayer.

Times: Multiple weekly sessions

Lectors & Eucharistic Ministers

Liturgical ministers serving at Mass in both English and IsiNdebele.

Training: Quarterly sessions

); }; export default Ministries;
